nodes.text: Turner Network Television, or TNT, is a television channel (founded in 1988) that aired episodes of Star Wars: The Clone Wars following their original showings on Cartoon Network.

Like Cartoon Network, which shows the Star Wars: The Clone Wars 3D television series, and the Warner Bros. movie studio, which distributed the Star Wars: The Clone Wars motion picture, TNT is a subsidiary of Time Warner.
As of September 14, 2016, TNT is one of two exclusive cable network broadcasters of the Star Wars film franchise, along with TBS, also owned by Turner Entertainment, a subsidiary of Time Warner.
